original_text: Josiah took the bones of the priests who had made sacrifices to the false gods. He burned the priests' bones on their own altars. That is how Josiah made Judah and Jerusalem clean again.
korean_text: 제사장들의 뼈를 제단 위에서 불살라 유다와 예루살렘을 정결하게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: Josiah took the bones of the priests
who had made sacrifices to the false gods
That is how Josiah made Judah clean again
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 요시아가 유다를 다시 깨끗하게 만든 방법입니다
